Convert parameters output to tidymodels convention

Source: R/helpers_miscellaneous.R
tidy_model_parameters.Rd

Convert parameters output to tidymodels convention

tidy_model_parameters(model, ...)

Arguments

model

Statistical Model.
...

Arguments passed to or from other methods. Non-documented arguments are digits, p_digits and ci_digits to set the number of digits for the output. See 'Examples' in model_parameters.default.

Examples

model <- lm(mpg ~ wt + cyl, data = mtcars)
tidy_model_parameters(model)

#> # A tibble: 3 x 8
#>   term        estimate std.error conf.low conf.high statistic df.error  p.value
#>   <chr>          <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <int>    <dbl>
#> 1 (Intercept)    39.7      1.71     36.2     43.2       23.1        29 3.04e-20
#> 2 wt             -3.19     0.757    -4.74    -1.64      -4.22       29 2.22e- 4
#> 3 cyl            -1.51     0.415    -2.36    -0.660     -3.64       29 1.06e- 3
